messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Warm weather rainy day activity
messages.msgSnippet: We did the same today. The kids put on their bathing suits and went to town in the mud puddle out front as well as the wading pool in the backyard, and just
messages.messageBody:
We did the same today. The kids put on their bathing suits and went to town in the mud puddle out front as well as the wading pool in the backyard, and just playing in the yard :-)

Beth

wallyandwendy <wallyandwendy@...> wrote:
Besides the basic splashing in puddles we set up the Slip 'n Slide. No
need to use the hose and the looks the neighbors give us are priceless!

Thanks to everyone who gave me Blog advice. I'll eventually get around
to starting one!

Enjoy the rain!!

Wendy, Jordan, Ian, Dommy and the rest of the soggy neighborhood kids
who hang at our house!!






Sing, Dance, Laugh...LOVE!

---------------------------------

messages.subject: Warm weather rainy day activity
messages.msgSnippet: Besides the basic splashing in puddles we set up the Slip n Slide. No need to use the hose and the looks the neighbors give us are priceless! Thanks to
messages.messageBody:
Besides the basic splashing in puddles we set up the Slip 'n Slide. No
need to use the hose and the looks the neighbors give us are priceless!

Thanks to everyone who gave me Blog advice. I'll eventually get around
to starting one!

Enjoy the rain!!

Wendy, Jordan, Ian, Dommy and the rest of the soggy neighborhood kids
who hang at our house!!
